mapper.sql: id, r_uid, DATE_FORMAT(r_kssj,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as 'r_kssj', DATE_FORMAT(r_jssj,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as 'r_jssj', r_gs, r_xmlb, r_xmmc, r_xmbh, r_xmjd, r_xxgz, r_wcqk, r_bxje, r_fphsw, r_kpdw, r_createdate, r_state, r_zpf, r_spf, r_csmc, r_qxmc, r_khdw, r_bfry, r_bffs, r_bfsj

r.id as 'id',u.RealName as 'realName',DATE_FORMAT(r.r_kssj,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as 'kssj',DATE_FORMAT(r.r_jssj,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as 'jssj',r.r_gs as 'gs',r.r_xxgz as 'xxgz' ,r.r_xmlb as 'xmlb',r.r_xmmc as 'xmmc', r.r_xmbh as 'xmbh',r.r_xmjd as 'xmjd', r.r_wcqk as 'wcqk',DATE_FORMAT(r.r_createdate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as 'createDate',case r.r_state WHEN '0' THEN '未审批' ELSE r.r_state end as 'state'
mapper.select:
SELECT
from t_record r LEFT JOIN t_users u on r.r_uid=u.ID

select CONVERT(SUM(r.r_gs),DECIMAL) as 'gs',CONVERT(SUM(r.r_bxje),DECIMAL) as 'bxje' from t_record r where 1=1
and r.r_xmbh=#{rXmbh}

select r.id as 'id',u.RealName as 'realName' ,DATE_FORMAT(r.r_kssj,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as 'kssj',r.r_gs as 'gs', r.r_xmlb as 'xmlb',r.r_xmjd as 'xmjd',r.r_wcqk as 'wcqk', IFNULL(r.r_bxje,'0') as 'bxje' from t_record r LEFT JOIN t_users u on r.r_uid=u.id where 1=1
and r.r_xmbh=#{rXmbh}

SELECT a.code as 'code',a.manager as 'manager' from (SELECT p.p_code as 'code',r.r_xmbh as 'xmbh',p.p_manager as 'manager' from t_record r RIGHT JOIN s_project_base p ON r.r_xmbh=p.p_code AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,r.r_createdate,NOW())<7 where p.p_state=0) a where a.xmbh is NULL
and a.manager=#{manager}

SELECT
from t_record r LEFT JOIN t_users u on r.r_uid=u.ID where 1=1
and r.r_xmbh=#{code}
ORDER BY r.r_createdate DESC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.insert: insert into t_record (id, r_uid, r_kssj, r_jssj, r_gs, r_xmlb, r_xmmc, r_xmbh, r_xmjd, r_xxgz, r_wcqk, r_bxje, r_fphsw, r_kpdw, r_createdate, r_state, r_zpf, r_spf, r_csmc, r_qxmc, r_khdw, r_bfry, r_bffs, r_bfsj ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rKssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rJssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rGs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rXmlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rXmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rXmbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rXmjd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rXxgz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rWcqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rBxje,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rFphsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rKpdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rCreatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rZpf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rSpf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rCsmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rQxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rKhdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rBfry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rBffs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rBfsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

r_bfsj,

mapper.update:
update t_record
r_kssj = #{rKssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
r_jssj = #{rJssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
r_gs = #{rGs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_xmlb = #{rXmlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_xmmc = #{rXmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_xmbh = #{rXmbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_xmjd = #{rXmjd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_xxgz = #{rXxgz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_wcqk = #{rWcqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_bxje = #{rBxje,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_fphsw = #{rFphsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_kpdw = #{rKpdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_createdate = #{rCreatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_state = #{rState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_zpf = #{rZpf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_spf = #{rSpf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_csmc = #{rCsmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_qxmc = #{rQxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_khdw = #{rKhdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_bfry = #{rBfry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_bffs = #{rBffs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_bfsj = #{rBfsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_record set r_kssj = #{rKssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, r_jssj = #{rJssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, r_gs = #{rGs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_xmlb = #{rXmlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_xmmc = #{rXmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_xmbh = #{rXmbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_xmjd = #{rXmjd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_xxgz = #{rXxgz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_wcqk = #{rWcqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_bxje = #{rBxje,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_fphsw = #{rFphsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_kpdw = #{rKpdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_createdate = #{rCreatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_state = #{rState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_zpf = #{rZpf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_spf = #{rSpf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_csmc = #{rCsmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_qxmc = #{rQxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_khdw = #{rKhdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_bfry = #{rBfry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_bffs = #{rBffs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_bfsj = #{rBfsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and r_uid = #{rUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
